structural_units.address:
Vanemuise 46
51003 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: In this course students will learn how to model dynamic natural systems and practice modelling an object. Basic computer skills are recommended.
description.et: Oskus dünaamiliste looduslike süsteemide modelleerimiseks ning mingi objekti praktiline modelleerimine. Soovitatavad algteadmised arvutiõpetusest.

objectives.en: To teach application of systems analysis.

learning_outcomes.en: Is able to produce and analyse simple dynamic models.
learning_outcomes.et: Suudab teha ja analüüsida lihtsaid dünaamilisi mudeleid.
